Package com.project.dao

Class VegItemsDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.project.dao.VegItemsDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VegItemsDao
    public class VegItemsDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements VegItemsDao
    This class implements the VegItemsDao interface and defines all it's methods. The methods are for inserting, retrieving, modifying and deleting VegItems from the database for a particular diet plan. This class takes the help of SignUpUtility class to establish and close the connection with the database to perform the required operations.
    Author:
    Harsh Sharma
